channel.title: How do I edit automatic player save?
channel.description:
Ok, so whenever someone goes on my server it laggs them out after a few seconds, I think it happens whenever there acount is being saved. So is there like anyway I can make it so it doesn't automaticaly save as often or somthing?
Thanks.
